Title: Enacts the "faithless servant reform act"
Summary: Enacts the "faithless servant reform act", creating a rebuttable presumption of retaliation or discrimination for certain actions of an employer; provides that the employer maintains the burden of proof in certain actions against an employee; limits an employer's remedy of forfeiture against an employee's compensation.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the executive law, in relation to enacting the "faithless servant reform act"
